body_html: Closing since fp16 support has been added to many ops. If a particular op does not support fp16 but should, another issue can be filed. We also plan making mixed-precision training easier in the future by improving the API.
body_text: Closing since fp16 support has been added to many ops. If a particular op does not support fp16 but should, another issue can be filed. We also plan making mixed-precision training easier in the future by improving the API.
body: Closing since fp16 support has been added to many ops. If a particular op does not support fp16 but should, another issue can be filed. We also plan making mixed-precision training easier in the future by improving the API.
